snippet: Isaiah Thomas scored 28 points, Jae Crowder matched his career high with 25 and the Boston Celtics snapped a four-game losing streak with a 103-94 win over the Indiana Pacers on Wednesday night....
lead_paragraph: Isaiah Thomas scored 28 points, Jae Crowder matched his career high with 25 and the Boston Celtics snapped a four-game losing streak with a 103-94 win over the Indiana Pacers on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Thomas, Celtics Snap 4-Game Skid With 103-94 Win Over Pacers
headline.print_headline: Thomas, Celtics Snap 4-Game Skid With 103-94 Win Over Pacers
